Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 9 Slashing and can curse

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Rakshasa makes 2 Claw attacks

Abilities.Ability 1: Limited Magic Immunity, The Rakshasa can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless it wishes to be.  It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects
Abilities.Ability 2: Innate Spellcasting, The Rakshasa can innately cast a number of spells

Damage Vulnerabilities.Damage 1: Piercing from magic weapons wielded by good creatures (really, this is a thing? lmao)

Damage Immunities.Damage 1: Bludgeoning, Piercing and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
